channel.title: Cache Editor 667 Help
channel.description:
Hi,
I downloaded a cache editor which i am guessing its made by someone called alex since every class is in 'bin\alex'.
So, when I downloaded it. I found that there was no run.bat so I created one, This was my run bat:
[CODE]@echo off java -classpath bin; alex.CacheLoader pause
[/CODE]
The console gave me this error:
[CODE]Parameters: isOldCache[bool], preload[bool] Press any key to continue . . .[/CODE]
So I looked it up, some one said i should replace this to:
[CODE]@echo off java -classpath bin; alex.CacheLoader false false pause
[/CODE]
so i did, now i get this error and i could not find anything on google which could help me fix this:
[CODE]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NullPointerException at alex.cache.FileSystem.validIndices(FileSystem.java:570) at alex.cache.FileSystem.getFile(FileSystem.java:136) at alex.cache.FileSystem.getFile(FileSystem.java:114) at alex.cache.loaders.ItemDefinition.loadItemDefinition(ItemDefinition.j ava:116) at alex.cache.loaders.ItemDefinition.<init>(ItemDefinition.java:107) at alex.cache.loaders.ItemDefinition.<init>(ItemDefinition.java:99) at alex.CacheLoader.makeTests(CacheLoader.java:45) at alex.CacheLoader.main(CacheLoader.java:34) Press any key to continue . . .[/CODE]
I tried to run it on eclipse but when i did, it gave me the 'Parameters: isOldCache[bool], preload[bool]' error and i dont know how to add 'false false' to it like i did in the run bat.
Could someone help me with this?
Please note, i also created a compiler and compiled it. Got no errors. cache files are all in cache folder located at data/cache
Thanks.

item.title: Cache Editor 667 Help
item.dc:creator: @Samih1996 Samih1996
item.description:
@Samih1996 wrote:

Hi,

I downloaded a cache editor which i am guessing its made by someone called alex since every class is in ‘bin\alex’.

So, when I downloaded it. I found that there was no run.bat so I created one, This was my run bat:

[CODE]@echo off
java -classpath bin; alex.CacheLoader
pause

[/CODE]

The console gave me this error:

Parameters: isOldCache[bool], preload[bool] Press any key to continue . . .

So I looked it up, some one said i should replace this to:

[CODE]@echo off
java -classpath bin; alex.CacheLoader false false
pause

[/CODE]

so i did, now i get this error and i could not find anything on google which could help me fix this:

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NullPointerException at alex.cache.FileSystem.validIndices(FileSystem.java:570) at alex.cache.FileSystem.getFile(FileSystem.java:136) at alex.cache.FileSystem.getFile(FileSystem.java:114) at alex.cache.loaders.ItemDefinition.loadItemDefinition(ItemDefinition.j ava:116) at alex.cache.loaders.ItemDefinition.<init>(ItemDefinition.java:107) at alex.cache.loaders.ItemDefinition.<init>(ItemDefinition.java:99) at alex.CacheLoader.makeTests(CacheLoader.java:45) at alex.CacheLoader.main(CacheLoader.java:34) Press any key to continue . . .

I tried to run it on eclipse but when i did, it gave me the ‘Parameters: isOldCache[bool], preload[bool]’ error and i dont know how to add ‘false false’ to it like i did in the run bat.

Could someone help me with this?

Please note, i also created a compiler and compiled it. Got no errors. cache files are all in cache folder located at data/cache

Thanks.
